## BC disturbance datasets

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(googlesheets4)
bc_data <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jrF-9GxjVUxCpmETts-CGrAiqsv6Wm407Qsez8uCN8k/edit#gid=521699518", sheet="BC datasets")
bc_data %>%
  select(Class, Layer, Coverage, Type, Year, Resolution, Source) %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_styling()
```
